metadata.name: Determination
metadata.description:
Youth, My Friend - 2.0 - 7 Aug 2022

When I was a child, I couldn't wait to become an adult. Adults can make decisions, people listen to them and take their words seriously, adults can do anything whenever they want without first having to explain themselves and justify their reasons why. 

But now that I'm older, I lament the days of my youth. Some were stolen from me, some I took for granted and some I just didn't take full advantage of. It was easier to believe in life's possibilities without the fear of failure. Life was much more simpler when I had little to no responsibilities. Back when my zest for life wasn't marred by the trauma, failures, callous choices and their consequences.

Oh but I look forward to the future with a richer passion. I choose to remain a visionary - a dreamer. 

I have found that youth is a state of mind and Youth is my friend.  
Remain young at heart and step boldly into your future.

Be determined and persevere, friend.
